channel.title: CVE Feed for Business Directory Team -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Business Directory Team -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-24251|2024-08-03T19:28:22.248Z -- business%20directory%20team -- business%20directory%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20easy%20listing%20directories%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The Business Directory Plugin – Easy Listing Directories for WordPress WordPress plugin before 5.11.2 suffered from a Cross-Site Request Forgery issue, allowing an attacker to make a logged in administrator update arbitrary payment history, such as change their status (from pending to completed to example)

item.title: CVE-2021-24248|2024-08-03T19:21:18.654Z -- business%20directory%20team -- business%20directory%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20easy%20listing%20directories%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The Business Directory Plugin – Easy Listing Directories for WordPress WordPress plugin before 5.11.1 did not properly check for imported files, forbidding certain extension via a blacklist approach, allowing administrator to import an archive with a .php4 inside for example, leading to RCE

item.title: CVE-2021-24249|2024-08-03T19:21:18.826Z -- business%20directory%20team -- business%20directory%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20easy%20listing%20directories%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The Business Directory Plugin – Easy Listing Directories for WordPress WordPress plugin before 5.11.2 suffered from a Cross-Site Request Forgery issue, allowing an attacker to make a logged in administrator export files, which could then be downloaded by the attacker to get access to PII, such as email, home addresses etc

item.title: CVE-2021-24250|2024-08-03T19:21:18.860Z -- business%20directory%20team -- business%20directory%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20easy%20listing%20directories%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The Business Directory Plugin – Easy Listing Directories for WordPress WordPress plugin before 5.11.2 suffered from lack of sanitisation in the label of the Form Fields, leading to Authenticated Stored Cross-Site Scripting issues across various pages of the plugin.

item.title: CVE-2021-24179|2024-08-03T19:21:18.652Z -- business%20directory%20team -- business%20directory%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20easy%20listing%20directories%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The Business Directory Plugin – Easy Listing Directories for WordPress WordPress plugin before 5.11 suffered from a Cross-Site Request Forgery issue, allowing an attacker to make a logged in administrator import files. As the plugin also did not validate uploaded files, it could lead to RCE.

item.title: CVE-2021-24178|2024-08-03T19:21:18.713Z -- business%20directory%20team -- business%20directory%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20easy%20listing%20directories%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The Business Directory Plugin – Easy Listing Directories for WordPress WordPress plugin before 5.11.1 suffered from Cross-Site Request Forgery issues, allowing an attacker to make a logged in administrator add, edit or delete form fields, which could also lead to Stored Cross-Site Scripting issues.

item.title: CVE-2023-51516|2024-08-02T22:32:10.367Z -- business%20directory%20team -- business%20directory%20plugin
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Business Directory Team Business Directory Plugin.This issue affects Business Directory Plugin: from n/a through 6.3.9.

item.title: CVE-2023-51516|2024-06-14T00:58:47.581Z -- business%20directory%20team -- business%20directory%20plugin
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Business Directory Team Business Directory Plugin.This issue affects Business Directory Plugin: from n/a through 6.3.9.

item.title: CVE-2023-51516|2024-06-14T20:10:57.873Z -- business%20directory%20team -- business%20directory%20plugin
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Business Directory Team Business Directory Plugin.This issue affects Business Directory Plugin: from n/a through 6.3.9.
